update zx_ct_Works set del_flag = '1', modify_time=#{param2.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user=#{param2.modifyUser}, modify_user_name=#{param2.modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and id in
#{model.id}
mapper.select: SELECT iw.id AS workID, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM zx_ct_works iw2 WHERE iw2.del_flag = '0' AND iw2.parentID = iw.id AND iw2.workType = '10' ) AS isLeaf, CASE iw.workType WHEN '10' THEN '清单' END AS workType, iw.workNo, iw.workName, iw.unit, IF(ISNULL(SUM( IF(ISNULL( iwtm.linkQuantity ), 0, ISNULL( iwtm.linkQuantity )) )),0,ISNULL(SUM( IF(ISNULL( iwtm.linkQuantity ), 0, ISNULL( iwtm.linkQuantity )) ))) AS linkQuantity, iw.contractPrice, iw.contractQty, IF(ISNULL( iw.contractAmt) ,0,iw.contractAmt) AS contractAmt, iw.quantity, iw.price, IF(ISNULL(iw.quantity * iw.price),0,iw.quantity * iw.price) AS amt, iw.checkQty, IF(ISNULL( ( iw.checkQty * iw.contractPrice )),0,iw.checkQty * iw.contractPrice) AS checkAmt FROM zx_ct_works iw LEFT JOIN zx_ct_worktomu iwtm ON iw.ID = iwtm.workID WHERE iw.del_flag = '0' AND iw.parentID = #{parentID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND iw.orgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND iw.workType = '10' AND iw.workBookId IN ( SELECT id FROM zx_ct_workbook WHERE del_flag = '0' AND orgId = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY iw.ID, iw.workType, iw.workNo, iw.workName, iw.unit, iw.price, iw.treeNode, iw.isLeaf, iw.contractPrice, iw.contractQty, iw.contractAmt, iw.quantity, iw.price, iw.checkQty ORDER BY iw.treeNode

SELECT ibi.workID, sum( ibi.balQty + ibi.balAltQty ) AS thisTotalQty, sum( ibi.balAmt ) AS thisTotalAmt FROM zx_ct_balanceitem ibi WHERE ibi.del_flag = '0' AND ibi.balID IN ( SELECT ib.id FROM zx_ct_balance ib WHERE ib.del_flag = '0' AND ib.orgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ib.period <= #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY ibi.workID

SELECT ibi.workID, sum( ibi.balQty + ibi.balAltQty ) AS lastTotalQty, sum( ibi.balAmt ) AS lastTotalAmt FROM zx_ct_balanceitem ibi WHERE ibi.del_flag = '0' AND ibi.balID IN ( SELECT ib.id FROM zx_ct_balance ib WHERE ib.del_flag = '0' AND ib.orgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ib.period < #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) GROUP BY ibi.workID
SELECT MAX( treeNode ) AS treeNode FROM zx_ct_Works WHERE del_flag = '0' AND LENGTH( treeNode ) = 8 AND workBookID = #{workBookID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: update zx_ct_Works set del_flag = '1', modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user = #{modifyUser}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName} where del_flag = '0' and workBookID = #{workBookID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE zx_ct_works SET isLeaf = '0', isAssignable = '0' WHERE del_flag = '0' AND id IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT parentID FROM zx_ct_works WHERE del_flag = '0' AND orgID = #{orgID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS taba )

delete FROM zx_ct_Works where id in
#{model.id}
